explanation: [0-0] In an arena with various racing tracks, there is a yellow slope on the right side of the screen and a trampoline in the middle. The trampoline has a blue frame and yellow sponge in the center. A BMX rider wearing a white short-sleeved shirt, black pants, and a blue helmet is riding a bicycle on the trampoline. Behind the trampoline, there is a girl wearing a black short-sleeved shirt. The girl has golden hair.

[0-7] The rider stands up and starts to move forward with the bike, bouncing on the trampoline. When the rider jumps to the middle, he starts to backflip with the bike. When the bike lands at the end of the flip, the wheels slide forward, and the rider falls on the trampoline. The rider then lets go of the handlebars, the bike is thrown backwards, and the rider turns around to look back as the bike smashes towards the girl who is walking behind the trampoline. After dodging, the girl quickly runs towards the upper right corner of the trampoline, and the rider quickly gets up after seeing this.
